issue.title: BulletLink::SetLinearVel is off by one timestep

content.raw:
I've tracked this down to our use of bullet motion states to get updated poses. The [btDiscreteDynamicsWorld::synchronizeSingleMotionState function](https://github.com/bulletphysics/bullet3/blob/master/src/BulletDynamics/Dynamics/btDiscreteDynamicsWorld.cpp#L349-L368) does some interpolation, and it appears to send the old transform to setWorldTransform. I have a fix in mind.

@erwincoumans perhaps we're using the bullet motion states wrong? Note that we call [stepSimulation](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/fccdeb63fb46c23087876f4e10780c7e7898650d/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletPhysics.cc?at=default#cl-475) with:
~~~
this->dynamicsWorld->stepSimulation(this->maxStepSize, 1, this->maxStepSize)
~~~
